content:
ConfigurationManager<T>.MinimumRefreshInterval Field

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols
Assembly:
Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.dll

In this Article

1 second is the minimum time interval that must pass for RequestRefresh() to obtain new configuration.

public static readonly TimeSpan MinimumRefreshInterval;
Returns
TimeSpan

To be added.
